channel.title: Chances of getting banned?
channel.description:
Ok well what do you think about this
Chance of getting banned in runescape by buying gp.
There is a level 10 person that trades with you and the agent says just give junk to him
You give him full steel
1mil - Chance of being banned 5% 2mil - 7% 3mil - 9% 5mil - 13%
So forth.
Im guessing you can stop at like 15mil :P?
12mil - 20%
Just and idea for the buyers out there.
Post what you think the % is :P
*This is what I think.

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

ninja nub:

Buying items is by far the best way and they almost never pay attention to it.

That is because you cannot exploit the shopping system in any way, and Jagex knows that.

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Ok 2k runescape rune arrows are like 2mil im guessing ir to lazy to figure so those cost like 20$

2mil $ cost 4$…lol

[quote=“ninja nub, post:17, topic:162343”]Buying items is by far the best way and they almost never pay attention to it.[/quote] Cheaper

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I think they add up shop values and the player vlaues and see if the trade makes sence. if not they beat you with the ban stick

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It probably only increases the priority of the report if the money amount exceeds the next stack/color. For example, trading 9million would be the same as 1million, but higher than 100k and lower than 10milion. But, I doubt a report is even sent for anything lower than 1m.

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Ok… so lets say like full steel for 2mil on a level 9 that you trade with? Dose it find a thing…or what ever in their systems. The level nine is who gives you the 2mil

[quote=“ninja nub, post:13, topic:162343”]I think there should be a new system for the gp buyers.

You want high amounts of money without getting caught?

Say you want 2m, they trade you 4m for something that is worth 2m at a stable rate. Like, sharks, or flax.[/quote]Yes but then you have to go through the buying process all over.

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Yea, now they even have a system that enumerates the value of each item. So you can’t trade a pot and pick for a p hat without tripping something in their system.

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

The how do they detect trades? uneven trades seems like it is the most obvios

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

billygotshot:

Actual jagex doesnt care about uneven trades… i know people who have bought around 1b in 100m incraments (he bought 100m at a time over a week he bought about 1b) giving the other person like 100k in junk and have not been banned

But we’re talking about the GE is set up with prices all set.

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Yeah, as long as you’re trading with a level 5 to like 20 it looks like a legit trade because jagex probably thinks he dosent know anything bout it yet.

billygotshot:

Actual jagex doesnt care about uneven trades… i know people who have bought around 1b in 100m incraments (he bought 100m at a time over a week he bought about 1b) giving the other person like 100k in junk and have not been banned

[/quote]
